name: Isa First Contact
description:
This game is a first person tactical shooter with touches of survival horror inspired by a futuristic era. The protagonist is a mercenary who has been hired by a government agency to end the threats of the system.

 For this, he has the help of certain weapons, as well as useful for the scene before entering it, the grenades and his vision.

--Controls--

WASD - Move

Q/E - Lean Left/Lean Right

R - Reload

C - Dron

Ctrl - Crouch

Right Mouse Button - Fire

Left Mouse Button - Scope

Esc - Continue/Menu/Exit

3/4 - Select Grenades

G - Throw Grenade
